projects.title: Maravilloso Peke
projects.description: Interactive Illustrated Early Literacy Book for preschool children, aiming to integrate reading and writing in one book through a well-designed editorial layout and children's illustrations that motivate them to learn. The book also encourages interaction, coloring, writing, and entertainment.

projects.title: Lo mejor de los 50's
projects.description: The Best of the 50s, A collectible album with 200 stickers showcasing the most significant events, characters, music, fashion, and aesthetics of the decade.

projects.title: Antoinin Artaud
projects.description: Illustrated book through graphic synthesis. Creating an exclusive compilation of 3 works in a luxury edition with excellent design, showcasing the best of Antonin Artaud, a brilliant poet, playwright, essayist, actor, and theater director.

projects.title: Coloring books
projects.description: A series of four (4) coloring books featuring Venezuelan themes such as birds, flowers, fruits, and animals. Aimed at preserving the culture and knowledge among children about the country.

projects.title: Preludio
projects.description: Preludio, is an Art Magazine that refers to music, cinema, and culture.
